about_the_game:
Powerful plants fight off invading weeds in a wacky 2D tower-defense game with Roguelite elements!

FEATURES:

~ Casual but challenging tower defense gameplay! Build up your plant-based defenses to fend off the invading weeds.
~ 4 different friend and foe types with unique stats and abilities!
~ Endlessly replayable. Upgrade your defenses, power up your plant army, or add another Bumble-Buzz to your meadow to boost your pollen production!
~ Easy to pick up, hard to master. Hyper-casual gameplay to kill time!
~ Roguelite elements! Use your upgrade cards to specialize your plant army, complete your run, complete challenges... then try again and build up a whole new loadout!

HOW TO PLAY:

~ Select a plant in the top left, then tap where you want place it in the meadow.
~ Use your different plants to fight against the incoming waves of increasingly-powerful weeds.
~ At the end of each round, select a reward card to power up your plant army!
~ Will you focus on attack? Defense? Or pollen production?
~ Complete challenges to build up your deck in the Card Bank!
~ Survive as many waves as you can - then try again to see if you can survive longer!


PLANTOONS is an indie game created by Theo Clarke and Chloe Page of the 2D Game Jammers Discord Community!

name: PLANTOONS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel I5 equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel I5 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space

short_description: Powerful plants fight off invading weeds in a wacky 2D tower-defense game with Roguelite elements!Build your defenses, upgrade your abilities, complete challenges... and survive the onslaught!
